chunks.content: Disputes can be opened for unauthorized transactions, billing errors, or merchant issues. Use reason code 10.4 for unauthorized transactions.
Always verify customer identity before opening disputes. Check transaction history and device information.
Card freeze requires OTP verification for security. Customer must provide valid OTP within 5 minutes.
Frozen cards cannot be used for new transactions. Existing pending transactions may still process.
Customers should set travel notices 24 hours before departure to avoid transaction blocks.
Travel notices can be set for specific countries and date ranges through the mobile app or website.
Pending vs captured transactions: Pending charges are authorizations, captured charges are final. Duplicates often resolve automatically.
If duplicate charges persist for more than 3 business days, escalate to dispute team.
High-risk factors: geo-velocity violations, device changes, unusual MCC codes, high amounts, off-hours transactions.
Medium-risk factors: new merchant, unusual spending pattern, first-time international transaction.
